Anak Sopir Wapres Adam Malik Gugat Pemilik Alexis soal Tanah
06 Nov 2019, 18:47 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Hotel Alexis. (Foto: CNN Indonesia/Hesti Rika)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Pendiri Grup Alexis, Alex Tirta dilaporkan ke Polda Metro Jaya terkait dugaan pemalsuan surat tanah milik Rahmat Sanusi pada Rabu (6/11).Rahmat bersama kuasa hukumnya Arbab Paproeka melaporkan Alex Tirta bersama seorang lain bernama Soenaryono dengan laporan bernomor LP/7162/XI/2019/PMJ/Dit. Reskrimum."Alex diduga terlibat dalam pemalsuan surat dan diduga memberikan pernyataan tidak benar dalam akte otentik sehingga terbit sertifikat itu," ujar Arbab kepada wartawan.Arbab menceritakan kronologi dugaan Rahmat bermula dari tanah milik almarhum ayahnya, Soekandi bin Bale yang seharusnya diwariskan kepada dirinya. Tanah yang berada di Jalan Yos Sudarso, Sunter Jaya, Jakarta Utara itu dibeli Soekandi pada 17 Juli 1961. Namun pada tahun 1998 setelah Soekandi meninggal dunia tanah tersebut malah dikuasai oleh seseorang bernama Mohammad Ichwan dan Taufik Ramdani. Soekandi sendiri, menurut Arbab, adalah sopir dari mantan Wakil Presiden RI ke-3 yakni (alm.) Adam Malik.Rahmat kemudian mencoba menempuh jalur hukum untuk merebut kembali tanah milik ayahnya. Ia melayangkan gugatan perdata terhadap Mohammad Ichwan, Taufik Ramdani, Nawawi Suryadi, Chufran Hamal dan Zawir Simon.Ia juga menggugat kepala Kantor Pertahanan Jakarta Utara, camat Tanjung Priok dan kepala kelurahan Sunter yang menjabat kala itu.Gugatan tersebut dikabulkan oleh Pengadilan Negeri Jakarta Selatan. Banding yang diajukan oleh Mohammad Ichwan dan Kantor Pertahanan Jakarta Utara pun ditolak PN Jakarta Utara.Eksekusi Tak DilakukanKendati menang di pengadilan, eksekusi putusan perdata tak kunjung dilakukan karena diduga ada tiga perkara bantahan dan perkara perlawanan terhadap putusan tersebut.Perkara bantahan sendiri upaya hukum terkait dengan sah atau tidaknya eksekusi.Tim kuasa hukum Rahmat menduga salah satu upaya hukum itu berhasil menangguhkan eksekusi putusan perdata yang sudah dimenangkan Rahmat.Hal itulah yang membuat mereka menduga ada keterlibatan dari Alex Tirta yang menyuruh nama-nama tersebut mengajukan perkara bantahan dan perkara perlawanan.Menyusul putusan tersebut, akta tanah yang didebatkan justru beralih nama menjadi Samina Salim. Pihak Rahmat mencurigai Alex Tirta menjadi dalang di balik bergantian nama ini.Hal itu terungkap karena Alex Tirta mengajukan gugatan ke Peradilan Tata Usaha Negara untuk menertibkan sertifikat tanah tersebut yang diklaim diperolehnya Samina Salim.Gugatan tersebut dikabulkan oleh PTUN yang kemudian memerintahkan Badan Pertahanan Jakarta Utara menerbitkan sertifikat tanah tersebut untuk Alex Tirta. Arbab mengatakan sertifikat tersebut terbit dengan nama Soenaryono.Atas dugaan tersebut Rahmat menggugat Alex dengan jeratan pasal 263 KUHP atau pasal 266 KUHP.Lina Novita, Staf Legal dan Jubir Alexis Group, tak merespons ketika dikonfirmasi CNNIndonesia.com. Pertanyaan melalui Whatsapp dan sambungan telepon tak dijawab. (fey/asa)

Vice Chancellor's son Adam Malik Sues Alexis Owner about Land
Nov 6 2019, 18:47 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Alexis Hotel. (Photo: CNN Indonesia / Hesti Rika)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Founder of the Alexis Group, Alex Tirta was reported to the Jakarta Police regarding allegations of falsification of Rahmat Sanusi's land certificate on Wednesday (6/11). Rahmat with his legal counsel Arbab Paproeka reported Alex Tirta along with another man named Soenaryono with a numbered report. LP / 7162 / XI / 2019 / PMJ / Dit. "Alex allegedly involved in the falsification of the letter and allegedly made an incorrect statement on the authentic certificate so that the certificate was published," Arbab told reporters. The land, located on Jalan Yos Sudarso, Sunter Jaya, North Jakarta, was bought by Soekandi on July 17, 1961. However, in 1998 after Soekandi died, the land was controlled by someone named Mohammad Ichwan and Taufik Ramdani. Soekandi himself, according to Arbab, was the driver of the 3rd ex-Indonesian Vice President (late) Adam Malik. Rahmat then tried to take legal action to reclaim his father's land. He filed a civil suit against Mohammad Ichwan, Taufik Ramdani, Nawawi Suryadi, Chufran Hamal and Zawir Simon. He also sued the head of the North Jakarta Defense Office, Tanjung Priok subdistrict head and the head of the Sunter sub-district who served at the time. The suit was granted by the South Jakarta District Court. An appeal filed by Mohammad Ichwan and the North Jakarta Defense Office was rejected by the North Jakarta District Court. Execution Not Done Despite winning in court, the execution of the civil decision was not carried out because there were allegedly three cases of rebuttal and cases of resistance to the decision. validity of the execution. Rahmat's legal team suspects that one of the legal remedies has been successful in suspending the execution of the civil ruling that Rahmat has won. That is what makes them suspect the involvement of Alex Tirta who ordered the names to submit rebuttal and resistance cases. the ruling, the deed of land being debated instead changed its name to Samina Salim. Rahmat suspected that Alex Tirta was the mastermind behind this change of name. It was revealed because Alex Tirta filed a lawsuit to the State Administrative Court to bring order to the land certificate which Samina Salim claimed to have obtained. The lawsuit was granted by the PTUN which then ordered the North Jakarta Defense Agency to issue a the land certificate is for Alex Tirta. Arbab said the certificate was issued under the name Soenaryono. On the allegation, Rahmat sued Alex with Article 263 of the Criminal Code or Article 266 of the Criminal Code. Lina Novita, Legal Staff and Spokesperson of the Alexis Group, did not respond when CNNIndonesia.com confirmed. Questions via Whatsapp and telephone connections are not answered. (fey / asa)
